name: Smashies
description:
Keep your eye on the ball as you guide it higher and higher through a series of obstacles. Just tap to bounce your way upwards and maneuver through the clear objects. But never touch the ones with color or you’ll have to start back at the bottom!

Collect Diamonds, unlock cool new balls and make your way to the burger at the top for a most delicious victory!

FEATURES
Mix-and-match level sets make each game a new challenge!
30+ cool balls to unlock! Will you choose the deadly Ninja sphere, the cute Panda ball or the yummy Ice Cream?
Fast but precise. Simple but challenging. See how far you can make it in this crazy world!
